short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your productivity with our extension! It replaces the standard copy function, allowing you to copy as plain text.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Plainify, your solution for hassle-free text copying. With Plainify, you can effortlessly copy text as plain, unformatted text, freeing you from the frustrations of dealing with unwanted formatting. 

Say goodbye to the distractions caused by dark modes interfering with your copied content. Streamline your workflow and focus on what matters most with Plainify by your side.

Main Features:
- Copy text as plain, unformatted text
- Easily switch of copy as plain text on and off 

Ready to simplify your copying experience? Install Plainify now and start boosting your productivity!
